petro.One 0.1.3.9004
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reads a OnePetro URL and converts it to a dataframe

Source: R/papers_to_dataframe.R
onepetro_page_to_dataframe.Rd

A OnePetro URL with a query is read into a HTML page and converted to a dataframe

onepetro_page_to_dataframe(url)

Arguments

url

char a OnePetro type URL

Examples

# Example 1
# Search papers with keyword "smartwell"
url_sw <- "https://www.onepetro.org/search?q=smartwell"
onepetro_page_to_dataframe(url_sw)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 6
#>    book_title              paper_id   dc_type  authors               year source
#>    <fct>                   <fct>      <fct>    <chr>                <int> <fct> 
#>  1 SMARTWELL® VALUATION U~ WPC-32151  confere~ Han, John T., WellD~  2002 WPC   
#>  2 A Smart Flow for Smart~ SPE-16782~ confere~ Carvajal, G.A., Hal~  2014 SPE   
#>  3 SPDC Delivers 1st Onsh~ SPE-16463~ confere~ Okpokpor, O. A., Sh~  2013 SPE   
#>  4 Method of Energetic In~ SPE-16689~ confere~ Popkov, V.I., Samar~  2013 SPE   
#>  5 Method of Energetic In~ SPE-16689~ confere~ Popkov, V.I., Samar~  2013 SPE   
#>  6 Application of SmartWe~ SPE-10011~ confere~ Brnak, Joshua Jude,~  2006 SPE   
#>  7 Drilling and Completin~ SPE-10571~ confere~ Jacob, Suresh, Well~  2007 SPE   
#>  8 Intelligent Well Techn~ SPE-71822~ confere~ Akram, Navid, Shell~  2001 SPE   
#>  9 Smartcontrols For Smar~ OMC-2001-~ confere~ Halmoey, S., FMC Ko~  2001 OMC   
#> 10 Technology Update: Pra~ SPE-0107-~ journal~ JPT staff, _, _       2007 SPE   
# Example 2
# Search for exact words ""vertical lift performance"
url_vlp <- "https://www.onepetro.org/search?q=%22vertical+lift+performance%22"
onepetro_page_to_dataframe(url_vlp)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 6
#>    book_title              paper_id    dc_type  authors              year source
#>    <fct>                   <fct>       <fct>    <chr>               <int> <fct> 
#>  1 The Evaluation of Vert~ SPE-1557-G~ journal~ McAfee, R.V., Axel~  1961 SPE   
#>  2 Production Forecast Im~ SPE-172465~ confere~ Mogbolu, Emmanuel,~  2014 SPE   
#>  3 An Evaluation of Water~ SPE-57272-~ confere~ Sabut, Bangkong, P~  1999 SPE   
#>  4 Compositional Two-Phas~ SPE-16925-~ confere~ Salisburg, P.E., H~  1987 SPE   
#>  5 A Novel Approach to Es~ OTC-26766-~ confere~ Haindade, Zishaan ~  2016 OTC   
#>  6 Determination of Press~ SPE-178282~ confere~ Dala, J. A., Niger~  2015 SPE   
#>  7 Real-Time Evaluation o~ SPE-163920~ confere~ Fernandez Castano,~  2013 SPE   
#>  8 Dual Concentric Gas-Li~ SPE-18391-~ journal~ Moore, P.C., BP Ex~  1991 SPE   
#>  9 Gas Lift - A Better Al~ ISOPE-I-91~ confere~ Kahali, Kishore, O~  1991 ISOPE 
#> 10 Conceptual Design and ~ SPE-191441~ confere~ Bagci, S., Baker H~  2018 SPE
